Name: Kitchen Duty
Description: Wipe down kitchen surfaces, clean appliances, and ensure all dishes are washed and put away.

Name: Bathroom Maintenance
Description: Clean and sanitize bathroom surfaces, including the sink, toilet, and shower or bathtub.

Name: Trash Collection
Description: Empty and replace trash bags in common areas, ensuring that recycling is sorted appropriately.

Name: Common Area Cleanup
Description: Vacuum or sweep and mop common living areas, including hallways, lounges, or shared spaces.

Name: Laundry Room Oversight
Description: Tidy up the laundry room, wipe down machines, and ensure that lost and found items are properly addressed.

Name: Outdoor Area Maintenance
Description: Take turns maintaining any outdoor areas, such as sweeping patios, picking up litter, or watering plants.
